senses.definition: 一啲人嘅膊頭唔橫，好似 A 字噉嘅形狀；呢種形狀嘅膊頭着衫唔好睇 (slacking shoulders)

senses.definition: #卸膊、唔負責任嘅人 (someone who consistently dodges their obligations or shifts responsibility onto others)

examples.text: 我哋阿頭正一 A 字膊，跟住佢你真係冇運行。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 dei6 aa3 tau2 zing3 jat1 ei1 zi6 bok3, gan1 zyu6 keoi5 nei5 zan1 hai6 mou5 wan6 haang4.
examples.translation: Our boss has sloppy shoulders. You don't want to be working under him.

senses.definition: 形容人唔負責任，將啲責任卸落人哋到 (to depict someone who consistently dodges their obligations or shifts responsibility onto others ; literally: "A" character shoulder)

examples.text: 佢淨係識A字膊，死都唔肯孭鑊。

examples.translation: He only shifts responsibilities, but never takes.

examples.translation: Feel free to add me (on some social media platform).

senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: dou1 hai6 ek6 sep1 zo2 go3 o1 faa4 keoi5 syun3.
examples.translation: I guess I'll just accept the offer.

senses.definition: 一種形象特質，畀人一種唔成熟、唔優雅但又想扮有型嘅感覺；髮型衣著嚟講，以1990至2000年代嘅#旺角 街頭男女及#古惑仔 為具體形象，而得MK之名（#旺角  Mong Kok 嘅簡稱），共通點係染髮、#古惑仔 服飾、風格強烈嘅飾物；引申至形容一切有呢種特質嘅人，或者係比較潮、比較出位嘅人，同埋佢哋通常會做嘅事，用嘅物品，講嘅説話等等。呢個詞通常帶有貶義。 (a particular style of aesthetics, that is the antithesis of the concept 'elegance and mature', but 'immature and stylish wannabe'. As a follower of the looks of street punks and gangsters in Mongkok from 1990s to 2000s, they are named with the place's alias MK. Often denoted by hair dyed blonde, thuggish outfit and mannerism. It is similar to the British slang 'chav' or 'yob'. Usually considered derogatory.)
senses.label: 形容詞

examples.jyutping: em1 kei1 zai2
examples.translation: yob

senses.definition: 未有內容 NO DATA
數量多嘅；#N 咁#多 (a lot; many)
senses.label: 數詞

examples.translation: X

senses.definition: 畀人定型為#MK 揸嘅車，通常係較平價同時有一定性能，可以飛車既車款，同時車身又經常會有改裝；主要係1990至2000年代嘅日本車，例如本田思域、豐田 Corolla AE100、三菱 Lancer 等。近年二手BMW及Mark X都有成為MK車既情況。 ("MK car", similar definition to ricers car. Typical refer to a set of private car that relatively cheap and with good performance that good for street racing or modding, which favoured by "#MK". Back to the old days mostly refer to Honda civic, Toyota AE100 or Mitsubishi Lancer, etc. For today second hand BMW and Toyota Mark X are becoming favorite of MK as well.)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 嚟#月經 嗰陣，經陰道排出嘅子宮內膜所形成嘅紅色物質 (menstrual blood; period blood)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: m血嘅顏色可以反映到你嘅健康狀況。
examples.jyutping: em1 hyut3 ge3 ngaan4 sik1 ho2 ji5 faan2 jing2 dou3 nei5 ge3 gin6 hong1 zong6 fong3
examples.translation: The color of your period blood can indicate your health condition.

senses.definition: 被虐待狂 (masochist)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 佢俾人綁住仲咁開心，肯定係M。
examples.jyutping: keoi5 bei2 jan4 bong2 zyu6 zung6 gam3 hoi1 sam1, hang2 ding6 hai6 em1.
examples.translation: She seems so happy to be tied up, she must be a masochist.

senses.definition: 即係#衞生巾；「#M」嚟自月經嘅英文「menstruation」頭一個字母（量詞：塊） (sanitary pad; sanitary napkin; sanitary towel; menstrual pad; literally "M towel" where "M" stands for menstruation)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 喺女校先會有M巾橫飛嘅壯景。
examples.jyutping: hai2 neoi5 haau6 sin1 wui5 jau5 em1 gan1 waang4 fei1 ge3 zong3 ging2.
examples.translation: Only in girls' schools might you see the unusual sight of pads flying around.

senses.definition: 指男士髮線啱啱開始後退，由額角兩邊開始脱髮，形成頭頂一個M字咁樣 (M-shaped hairline; maturing hairline)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 男人上咗年紀唔好好保養就好易有M字額。
examples.translation: Middle aged men who don't take good care of their body will easily have M-shaped hairline.

senses.definition: 未做到全屏幕嘅智能電話，屏幕上方用嚟放置感應器嘅黑色非像素區域 (phone notch, phone with notched screen)

examples.text: 依家越嚟越多電話有M字額。
examples.translation: More and more phones have notches these days.

senses.definition: 泛指冒牌貨；有時專指質素高嘅冒牌產品，相對於B貨、C貨，A貨響外觀、材料、手工都同正牌貨幾乎一樣，只係價格上平一大截，大陸叫做「#高仿」、「精仿」 (counterfeit, fake; sometimes especially means high quality fake products, not like the B or C products, they often have similar outlook, material and craftmanship with the genuine products, only the price is much cheaper. Literally: A products)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 填海位置係白海豚重要棲息海域，政府嘅所謂補償措施只係「A貨」，根本減輕唔到對生態嘅巨大損害。
examples.translation: The land reclamation site, crucial to white dolphins' habitat, is compromised by the government's inadequate compensation measures which fail to alleviate significant ecological harm.

senses.definition: 玉石術語，指純天然色澤翡翠，只經過雕刻打磨，無經過化學染色或電色、無經高熱、高壓等人工修補程序，即係「正色」或「真色」 (jade industry jargon, means the all nature color jades, only graved and polished, no chemical dye or electrical coloring, no high heat or pressure revamping was done, they also called "authentic color" or "true color". Literally: Class A (Jade))

examples.text: 呢幾粒係緬甸玉A貨，無染無補，原色原石，唔係咁易揾到咁靚㗎。
examples.translation: These pieces are class A jades from Burma, no dye no revamp, original color from original stone, I'm sure you can hardly find any better ones out of here.

senses.definition: 文學#碩士 學位；英文「Master of Arts」嘅簡稱，課程通常關於#人文科學 或#社會科學 方面 (abbreviation for "Master of Arts"; postgraduate degrees usually focusing on the studies of the humanities or social sciences)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 哲學#碩士；英文"Master of Philosophy"嘅簡稱；係一種研究型碩士學位，學科不限，接近#博士 程度；要求學生完成課堂功課考試，並喺導師指導下獨立研究，寫成論文，通過答辯 (abbreviation for "Master of Philosophy")
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 講嘢、嗌，好少會單用 (to speak, to say; to shout)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: e1 dou1 mou5 dak1 e1
examples.translation: to have nothing to say

senses.definition: 拍影片時因為演出唔理想而重拍、而又或指果啲唔理想嘅片段。由日製英語「No Good」的字首簡稱而嚟 (blooper;to play a scene (a "take") badly in film-making so that is needs to be shot again (NG stands for "no good").)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 拍攝其中一個鏡頭果陣，女主角係咁#食螺絲 而要NG成三十次。
examples.translation: [ChatGPT]During the filming of one scene, the female lead kept messing up and had to redo it 30 times.

phonetic.original: em1 pi1 fi1:em1 pi1 !fwi1:em1 pi1 saam1

senses.definition: 音樂檔案類型，即係標準聲頻層3(MPEG-1 Audio Layer3)嘅英文縮寫。因為壓縮程度高，所以與原檔相比音質略差但容量細好多，因此被廣泛使用。香港多讀作「M P Three」，陸台則多讀作「M P 三」 (shorthand of MPEG-1 Audio Layer3, a popular audio format for storing music)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 首歌個 file太大喇，可唔可以轉咗做 mp3 先俾我？
examples.jyutping: sau2 go1 go3 faai1 lou2 taai3 daai6 laa3, ho2 m4 ho2 ji5 zyun3 zo2 zou6 em1 pi1 fi1 sin1 bei2 ngo5?
examples.translation: This song's file is too big, can you convert it into mp3 first before sending it to me?

senses.definition: 可以播 mp3 檔嘅音樂播放器（量詞：部） (music player which can play mp3 files)

examples.text: 我唔見咗部 mp3 啊。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 m4 gin3 zo2 bou6 em1 pi1 fi1 aa3.
examples.translation: I have lost my mp3 player.

keywords: em1 pi1 fi1:em1 pi1 !fwi1:em1 pi1 saam1

senses.definition: 含有多個選項嘅問題；#MC題（量詞：條） (multiple choice style questions)

examples.text: 我做唔晒份卷，最後嗰幾條MC全部撞答案。

senses.definition: 唱#rap 嘅人嘅稱呼 (microphone controller, a common title for rappers)

examples.jyutping: ei2, dim2 gaai2 wui5 hai6 gam2 ge2?
examples.translation: Hey, why is it like that?

senses.definition: 好多年 (many years)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ngo5 tung4 keoi5 sik1 zo2 en1 nin4 laa1!
examples.translation: I have known him for ages!

senses.definition: 中國公司喺中國大陸上市嘅股份，通常同「#H股」相對 (A-share, domestic share in China)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 一種快乾強力膠水牌子；又叫做#萬能膠。可以用嚟補鞋之類需要強啲黏力嘅嘢；缺點係會太快乾、黐實咗個樽或者黐著咗隻手 (super glue; cyanoacrylate; from the brand "Aron Alpha")
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 個模型爛咗，同我揾啲AA膠黐返佢。
examples.jyutping: go3 mou4 jing4 laan6 zo2, tung4 ngo5 wan2 di1 ei1 ei1 gaau1 ci1 faan1 keoi5.
examples.translation: The model is broken. Help me fix it with some super glue.

senses.definition: audio（#音頻）同 video（#視頻）嘅英文縮寫 (audio-video)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: ei1 wi1 sin3
examples.translation: audio-visual cable

senses.definition: adult video（#成人#影片）嘅英文縮寫；色情影片；#A片 (sexy or soft pornography films; etymology: adult video)

examples.jyutping: tai2 ei1 wi1
examples.translation: to watch porn

senses.definition: 日本拍#AV 嘅女演員（量詞：個） (Japanese female porn star)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: #工商管理#碩士 嘅縮寫 (Master of Business Administration)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 自動櫃員機，用嚟喺銀行户口撳錢出嚟嘅機器（量詞：部） (Automatic teller machine)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: cing2 man6 zeoi3 kan5 bin1 dou6 jau5 ei1 ti1 em1 aa3?
examples.translation: Excuse me, where's the nearest ATM?

senses.definition: #月經 (menstruation)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: lei4 em1
examples.translation: to menstruate

senses.definition: #經期 (menstrual cycle)

examples.text: 我啲M唔係好準，有時一個月兩次，有時幾個月先一次。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 di1 em1 m4 hai6 hou2 zeon2, jau5 si4 jat1 go3 jyut6 loeng5 ci3, jau5 si4 gei2 go3 jyut6 sin1 jat1 ci3.
examples.translation: My period is irregular. It might come twice a month or only come once every few months.

senses.definition: #經血 (menstrual blood)

examples.jyutping: lau6 em1
examples.translation: to leak menstrual blood, usually on clothing

senses.definition: #經紀、#中介 人、#中介 公司、#獵頭公司 (agent; broker)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 我朋友係agent，買保險可以揾佢。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 pang4 jau5 hai6 ei1 zeon2, maai5 bou2 him2 ho2 ji5 wan2 keoi5.
examples.translation: My friend is an insurance agent, you can find him if you want to buy an insurance.

senses.definition: 通宵巴士；呢啲巴士線嘅編號前面都會加「N」字做標記，所以咁叫（量詞：架） (night bus; overnight bus)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: co5 en1 ce1 faan1 uk1 kei2
examples.translation: to go home by overnight bus

senses.definition: 政務主任嘅俗稱；係#公務員 政務職系入面最基本嘅職級，"AO" 就係英文職級名嘅簡寫 (short for Administrative Officer)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: gam1 nin2 hou2 do1 jan4 bou3 ei1 ou1 aa3.
examples.translation: Many applicants apply for the AO vacancies this year.

senses.definition: #擦鞋仔；英文ass kisser嘅簡稱 (ass kisser; sycophant)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 指類似AK-47嘅俄製或大陸製自動步槍；AK來自俄語：Автомат Калашникова，意為「卡拉什尼科夫自動步槍」，係由前蘇聯槍械設計師米哈伊爾·季莫費耶維奇·卡拉什尼科夫設計 (automatic rifles made in Russia or China similar to AK-47, designed by Калашникова, the former Soviet Union fire arm designer; acronym of Автомат Калашникова in Russian)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: 當年啲#省港旗兵 揸住AK連環打劫幾間金舖，差佬都冇晒符。
examples.jyutping: dong1 nin4 di1 saang2 gong2 kei4 bing1 zaa1 zyu6 ei1 kei1 lin4 waan4 daa2 gip3 gei2 gaan1 gam1 pou2, caai1 lou2 dou1 mou5 saai3 fu4.
examples.translation: In those years the mainland robbers successively robbed several jewellery shops using AK. The police were totally outgunned.

senses.definition: 通宵巴士路線；#N車 路線 (night bus route; overnight bus route)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: jau5 me1 en1 sin3 gwo3 hoi2 gaa3?
examples.translation: Any cross-harbour night bus route?

senses.definition: 音樂檔案類型，即係標準聲頻層4(MPEG-1 Audio Layer4)嘅英文縮寫。因為壓縮程度高，所以與原檔相比音質略差但容量細好多，因此好廣泛咁被應用。 (shorthand of MPEG-1 Audio Layer4, a type of music files)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 比起#mp3，可以播更多格式嘅音樂播放器（量詞：部） (music player which can play more formats than an mp3 player)

examples.translation: This is not an iPod. It's just an mp4 player.

senses.definition: 一種膠水；即係樹脂膠，學名係環氧樹脂，叫AB膠係因為分開咗兩支，要將兩部份溝埋先會凝固，唔溝埋無黏力；基本上咩都黐得，包括木、鐵，甚至石都得，喺工程、工業都好常見 (epoxy; epoxy resin)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 快餐店#麥當勞 嘅花名 (nickname for McDonald's fastfood restaurant)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 電腦軟件開發商#微軟 嘅花名 (nickname for Microsoft)
埋單嘅時候，自己畀自己嗰份（有時指除開條數、平均分擔）。 (to split the bill and pay for each own's expenses; going Dutch)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.text: AA制係一個比較公平嘅做法。
examples.jyutping: ei1 ei1 zai3 hai6 jat1 go3 bei2 gaau3 gung1 ping4 ge3 zou6 faat3.
examples.translation: Going Dutch is a relatively fair system.

senses.definition: #MK 嘅人，詳見#MK（量詞：個／條） (chav, yob; followers of the looks of street punks and gangsters in Mongkok from 1990s to 2000s)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: sei2 em1 kei1, daan6 hoi1 laa1!
examples.translation: You bloody chav, go away!

senses.definition: #旺角 拼音嘅簡稱 (abbreviation of Mong Kok)
senses.label: 名詞

examples.jyutping: hai2 em1 kei1 dang2 laa1 ngo5 dei6.
examples.translation: Let's meet at MK (Mong Kok).

senses.definition: 偷 (to steal)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: hou2 em1 m4 em1, em1 tou3?
examples.translation: Of all things, why steal condoms?

phonetic.original: e1 dou1 mou5 dak1 e1:nge1 dou1 mou5 dak1 nge1

senses.definition: 解釋、反駁唔到 (to have nothing to say; to have no explanation or refutation to offer)
senses.label: 語句

keywords: e1 dou1 mou5 dak1 e1:nge1 dou1 mou5 dak1 nge1

senses.definition: 政府嘅助理文書主任嘅俗稱；係#公務員 文書體系入面相對高階嘅位置，係最低級嘅文書主任；雖然睇落個名有啲似，但係同#AO，即係政務主任無直接嘅關係（量詞：個） (short for Assistant Clerical Officer)
senses.label: 名詞

senses.definition: 即係#月經到；「M」嚟自月經嘅英文「menstruation」頭一個字母 (to menstruate; to have period)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.jyutping: keoi5 em1 dou3, m4 hou2 gik1 keoi5 aa3.
examples.translation: She is on her period. Don't provoke her.

senses.definition: 即係#經痛；「M」嚟自月經嘅英文「menstruation」頭一個字母 (menstrual pain; menstrual cramps; "M" stands for menstruation)
senses.label: 動詞

examples.text: 我M痛，想要個暖水袋敷下。
examples.jyutping: ngo5 em1 tung3, soeng2 jiu3 go3 lyun5 seoi2 doi2 fu1 haa5.
examples.translation: I'm suffering from menstrual pain. I want a hot water bottle for pain relief.
